mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.name, a.type, a.address, a.enabled, a.remarks, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.master, a.primary_person, a.deputy_person FROM sys_department a
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_department ( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, type, address, enabled, remarks, create_date, update_date, del_flag, master, primary_person, deputy_person ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{type}, #{address}, #{enabled}, #{remarks}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{master}, #{primaryPerson}, #{deputyPerson} )
